sentences.sContent: It has been suggested the founders were not true patriots but men out to protect their own interests.
sentences.sCn: 有人指出创建者并非真正的爱国者，而是一些维护自己利益的人。

remMethod.val: patr(父亲) ＋ iot → 把祖国当作父亲的人 → 爱国者； 参考： 电影《爱国者》是英文名就是The Patriot

words.tran: 爱国主义；爱国心，爱国精神

trans.tranCn: 爱国者， 爱国主义者
trans.tranOther: someone who loves their country and is willing to defend it – used to show approval
